welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Codroipo, a charming city in northern Italy known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to soak up the beauty of our city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Airfield Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Airfield Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aviano Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronchi Dei Legionari Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
